name: Star Wars Pinball Pack Unlock
description:
A long time ago, in a galaxy far, far away....
Star Wars Pinball lets you relive the greatest moments of the Star Wars universe on a set of brand new pinball tables!
Star Wars Pinball is a FREE download on PlayStation®Vita system for all users. Try each table before you decide to buy!

Star Wars Pinball also invites all players to take part and exert their influence in the unique Balance of the Force!
Join either the Light Side or Dark Side and take part in the epic struggle by simply posting scores for your chosen side!

Full list of features:
-Three brand new tables: Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back, Boba Fett, and The Clone Wars
-Exciting multiplayer modes, including local split-screen and hotseat multiplayer, online, and worldwide tournaments
-New tables released regularly through the PlayStation®Store
-Trophies for each table

Some functions and features may not be available on PlayStation TV.

1-4 player(s)
Network Players 2-4
Network Features
512KB Minimum
Touchscreen
Rear Touch Pad
Dual Analog Sticks
Motion Sensor
Microphone

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. This item may be used with up to 2 activated PlayStation®Vita systems associated with this Sony Entertainment Network account.
